00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOV
00042 
00043 #include "lov_cl_internal.h"
00044 
00049 /*****************************************************************************
00050  *
00051  * Lovsub page operations.
00052  *
00053  */
00054 
00055 static void lovsub_page_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00056                              struct cl_page_slice *slice)
00057 {
00058 }
00059 
00060 static const struct cl_page_operations lovsub_page_ops = {
00061         .cpo_fini   = lovsub_page_fini
00062 };
00063 
00064 int lovsub_page_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00065                      struct cl_page *page, pgoff_t index)
00066 {
00067         struct lovsub_page *lsb = cl_object_page_slice(obj, page);
00068         ENTRY;
00069 
00070         cl_page_slice_add(page, &lsb->lsb_cl, obj, index, &lovsub_page_ops);
00071         RETURN(0);
00072 }
